page.title: 13 CHRISTMAS MEMORIES.
page.content: A CLASS OF FIVE YEAR OLDS FROM ATTLEBOROUGH FIRST SCHOOL WERE ASKED WHAT THEY REMEMBERED ABOUT HOW THEY CELEBRATED CHRISTMAS 1984.THIS PROJECT TOOK PLACE IN JUNE 1985 AND THE REPRESENTATIVE CHILD SPOKE INTO A TAPE RECORDER,WHICH WAS THEN TRANSCRIBED. Andrew Feakes.Date of birth 22.2.80 Position in family 2/2 On Christmas Eve we had our bath and went straight to bed.I hung my pillow case up in my bedroom by the radiator for Father Christmas to fill and I woke up at 7 o'clock.My brother has his own bedroom and he woke up at 7.17 exactly. My Mummy and Daddy helped us open our presents.My favourite present was a box of toffees.Father Christmas brought me some toys and sweeties.We had two or three presents on the Christmas tree.
